patthana16.55:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.55:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo
patthana16.55:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.55:2.1_2: naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.55:2.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana16.55:2.1_4: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
